Title: Provides for the sale of salvaged airbags; repealer
Summary: Provides for the sale of salvaged airbags; allows for the sale of non-deployed recycled airbags in New York, provided that such airbags meet required safety standards.
LawCode: Rpld §398-d sub 6 ¶(e), §415-c, add §415-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the sale of salvaged airbags; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
